content:
You will be given a client response which you will analyze and identify the intents. The intents are the skill identifier IDs. Only return the intents that have been identified. For each intent identified, identify the entities from the provided slots to complete the information. Do not omit a slot because an entity was not identified. In this case, fill that slot with "None." If none of the intents are identified, select the "No intent is identified" ID. 

Your answer should be in JSON with the keys as the intent ID followed by a dictionary of the slot ID and the extracted value. 

Client Response: Whenevr I open thrillers app, my phone disconects from the wifi. Ive tested this over and over againand it seems that no matter what I try to do it is constantly deconnecting. I've tried restarting my phone, factory resettting my phone, but still nothing helps my friends dont seem to have any issues with this at all. why cant i jsut stay connected? i have an iphone 15 pro max, so youdthink that there rlly wouldnt be any problems with this phone.
